name: Crypt of the Old Gods
description:
Play as a necromancer trying to recruit followers to help them summon an Old God to destroy the world as we know it.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Left Mouse - Attack
Right Mouse - Interact
Hold Ctrl + 1,2,3 - Place Traps

Credits:
Joshua Long (RadethDart) - Game Design / Development / Sounds
Anna (Vampy3k) - Art
Elizabeth Wilkie (VictoryRoses) - Animation
Johnathyn Long (LlamaSalami) - Music

Ranked #1 Overall for the Can You Survive This game jame!
